name: Zuldaxx
description:
Zuldaxx Corp. was founded by two Ex-Apple and Ex-Microsoft Engineers who picked the island tax haven of Comoros to launch their new portal technology company. The rest is history.

https://www.facebook.com/Zuldaxx/

http://www.zuldaxx.com

NOTE: MINIMUM OF 2 PLAYERS REQUIRED TO PLAY, SO BRING A FRIEND!

FAQ:

Q: Why am I paying money for a battle royale game?

A: Our promise to you is no microtransactions. Ever.
